暍暍暍
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

暍字的基本解释

暍
yē
中暑：“夏，大旱，民多暍死。”
热：“时属炎暍，热病有加。”

暍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yē］
［《廣韻》於歇切，入月，影。］
［《廣韻》許葛切，入曷，曉。］
(1)中暑；伤暑。
(2)暑热；热。
(3)通“褐”。

暍字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暍； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页498第09
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於歇切，音謁。【說文】傷暑也。【玉篇】中熱也。【前漢·武帝紀】夏大旱，民多暍死。【荀子·富國篇】夏不宛暍。【淮南子·俶眞訓】暍者望冷風於秋。　又【集韻】阿葛切，音遏。【博雅】煥也。又許葛切，音喝。熱也。

暍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
暍字的起名意思

暂无。

drink
Basic explanation of words
drink
yē
Heatstroke: "Summer, severe drought, many people die."
Fever: "It was inflammation at the time, and fever was aggravated."
drink
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yē］
["Guangyun" cuts at rest, enters the moon, and shadows. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Geqie, Entering, Xiao. ]
(1) Heat stroke; heat injury.
(2) Heat; hot.
(3) Through "brown".
drink
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　暍; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: Page 498 09
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Yu Xieqie, the sound is heard. [Said the text] The heat is also hurt. 【Jade articles】Medium hot too. 【Pre-Han·Wu Emperor Ji】Drought in Xia, many people died. [Xunzi·Fu Guo Chapter] Xia Buwanshu. 【Huainanzi·Fu Suixun】The cold wind is in the autumn.　[Jiyun] Ageqie, sound restrained. [Bo Ya] Huan Ye. Xu Geqie again, sound drinking. Hot too.
drink

drink
Name meaning
Nothing.
yē
страдать (болеть) от жары (от жара)
暍者望冷风于秋 кто страдает от жары, тот чает осеннего ветра
